data.text: @jglinn @startuphealth @deorodevices Thanks Jim! Are you at the conference? Let’s connect!

“COVID helped us realize who we were as a company - we are a learning science company that has a range of products that support patients, VR for home dialysis being one of them.” @TRFitzpatrick @ikona_health
“Society has been trained to think that opioids are the good stuff, but it’s way more beneficial to get in front of the pain for best outcomes.” @brandnewland @GoldfinchHLTH
